title: Kingdom of heaven or kingdom of God
short_title: Kingdom of heaven or kingdom of God
content: Kingdom of heaven or kingdom of God

These terms are used in various combinations and with varying meanings. Generally speaking, the kingdom of God on the earth is the Church. It is a preparation for the greater kingdom—the celestial or kingdom of heaven. This is the manner in which these terms are used in
. However, kingdom of heaven is sometimes used in scripture to mean the Church (as in
), meaning that the true church on the earth is the path to heaven and is the kingdom of heaven on earth.
